column1: #Text=Iroh says : " Where did you get these ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " What does it matter where they came from ? "
#Text=Villager says : " That party pooper 's ruining Avatar Day ! "
#Text=Aang says : " That party pooper 's my friend ! "
#Text=Villager says : " It 's going to kill us with its awesome Avatar powers ! "
#Text=Aang says : " No , I 'm not , I ... " Tong says : " I suggest you leave !
